subdisciplines.name: Concrete Structures
subdisciplines.description: Design and analysis of structures made primarily of concrete, including buildings and bridges.

subdisciplines.name: Steel Structures
subdisciplines.description: Design and analysis of structures made primarily of steel, including buildings, bridges, and towers.

subdisciplines.name: Timber Structures
subdisciplines.description: Design and analysis of structures made primarily of wood, including buildings and bridges.
